## Source: ossf-package-analysis (77f155a18dc8fb588bf11dd0295829c0b888fb8cec34fa1eae7896fac185219f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@nationalgeographicsociety/ngsui-header' @ 100.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
